content: also used hobbii baby snuggle yarn need a small amount of blue and white yarn modifications made *with color aqua work* **round 1 ** magic_ring 6sc in the magic_ring 6sts **round 2 ** increase x6 12sts **round 3 ** single_crochet increase x6 18sts **round 4 ** single_crochet single_crochet increase x6 24sts **round 5-8 ** 24sc 24sts **round 9 ** *flo for all stitches* slip_stitch ch2 2hdc in same st 5sc slip_stitch ch3 1trc in same st 1trc ch3 slip_stitch in same st 5sc slip_stitch ch2 2hdc in same st 10 single_crochet *change the yarn color to white* **round 10 ** blo single_crochet 5sc blo single_crochet x2 5sc blo single_crochet 10sc 24sts **round 11 ** single_crochet single_crochet decrease x6 18sts **round 12 ** single_crochet decrease x6 12sts attach the safety eyes and stuff with polyfil **round 13 ** decrease x6 6sts *leave a tail to close the opening * thread the tail onto a tapestry needle go under the front loop of next stitch going from the inside of your piece to the outside repeat for each stitch pull to tighten and close opening hide rest of tail inside of your piece
